alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 4:53PM CDT until May 07 at 11:18AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. James River at Galena affecting Stone County. James River near Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties. Current River near Powder Mill affecting Carter and Shannon Counties. .Heavy rainfall received overnight has caused river levels to rise above flood stage. For the Jacks Fork River Basin...including Alley Spring...Minor flooding is forecast. For the James River Basin...including Boaz, Galena...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Current River...including Powder Mill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Boaz. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Moderate Flood Stage. Water approaches structures near the river. Approximate level of the one percent chance flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 400 PM CDT.
